amendment.description: To authorize the prepositioning of Department of Defense assets to improve support to civilian authorities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4534 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6386) To authorize the prepositioning of Department of Defense assets to improve support to civilian authorities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4534 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4534 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
